"Sign in" button sends user on sign in page
"Sign UP" button sends user in Sign up page
The authorization error message will appear if a user enters an invalid  password or username
Authorization error message will appear if the user leaves "Password" or "Username"  field blank
The [Sign In] button has to initiate the [username/email]/password pair checking action.
Users that have  not been  registered yet can not log in
‘Need an account’ link redirects user on "Sign up" page
User can copy/paste text in the input field for "Username"
Lowercase letters, as well as uppercase letters, are allowed at "Username" field
"Username" field is mandatory
User can log in only with a username/email which already exists in the server DB.

"Password" field should contain mask

"Username" field is mandatory
Username should contain at least 4 characters
Username can not contain more than 36 characters

ERROR MESSAGE should appear: “Username/Email has been already taken“ if user enter not unique  username
The format of the email has to be [name]@[domain].[top-domain]
The [name] of the email can  contain integer/Latin/symbols( "."," _"," +") characters

"Email" field is mandatory

Password can not contain more than 36 characters

Check the list of articles that is published by the registered user
Check if user's name, user's photo and publishing data correspond  to actual user's information
After clicking on # tag all possible articles on this topic  are shown
User is linked on chosen page after clicking on page number
User is linked on the web page "Fork on GitHub" after clicking on link
User can't create article with empty mandatory fields
After clicking on [ Publish article button] the post is published if all mandatory fields are filled
Unregistered user has to be redirect  to "Sign In" form if he reaches "New Post" form by link
Article title /What’s this article about?/Write your article (in markdown) are mandatory fields
User can create two or more articles with the same title at the "Article title " field
Error message will  appear if "Article title" field contains less that 5 characters
"Article title" field can not  contain more than 240 symbols
Spaces can not be entered as the first/last or one by one in the raw at all fields of the page bar
"What’s this article about?" field can not contain less than  10 symbols or more than 240 symbols
If user leaves "Write your article" field empty, the error message“Body of article can't be blank.” will appear
"Write your article" filed can contain Min 20 symbols and   Max 9000 symbols
User can not add any attachments to "Write your article" filed
User can slide-down right corner of text box to change size of "Write your article" filed
"Enter tags" field can contain min  2 and max30 symbols (only letters and numbers)
User can  not use more than 10 tags for one article
"Enter tags" field  is not key sensitive.
Each tag at "Enter tags" field must start from “#” symbol.
An error message  appears if one of the mandatory fields is left blank
If a user leaves “New Post” screen without publication, all entered info vanishes
After successful publication of an article, the user gets redirected to the User's Article page.
"Article" page is available only for logged in user
User can edit his article clicking on [Edit article] button
User can  delete  his article clicking on [Delete article] button
Text field “Write a comment…” can contain from 1 to 240 symbols
User can post a comment after clicking on [Post comment] button
Only author of the comment can delete comment by clicking on [Delete]  button
Only logged in authors of the article can edit it
Changes are added and saved after clicking on [Edit article] button

“Cancel” button returns the user to the User's Article page without saving the changes

User can't login with wrong/incorrect email
